questions.question: What is your full name?
questions.prompt: Identify and return only the name from the sentence

questions.question: What is your date of birth?
questions.prompt: Please change only the date of birth in DD-MM-YYYY format.

questions.question: What is your current residential address?
questions.prompt: Extract only the residential address and remove any extra text

questions.question: Provide your Aadhar Card Number, use the Image Capture button to submit it
questions.prompt: Extract only Aadhar Number from the image

questions.question: What is your estimated income range?
questions.prompt: Extract only the estimated income range and remove any extra text

questions.question: What type of employment are you engaged in?
questions.prompt: Extract only the type of employment remove any extra text

questions.question: Add your profile image, use the Image Capture button to submit it
Provide your signature, use the Image Capture button to submit it
